original_title: Бегущие по краю. Часть 2: Сирасэ Нобу
overview: A film about the first Japanese expedition to Antarctica at the beginning of the last century. This trip involved Sakhalin dogs under the guidance of mushers from the village. Ochikho (now the village of Lesnoye, Korsakovsky District).
title: Бегущие по краю. Часть 2: Сирасэ Нобу
